```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(googlesheets4)
library(janitor)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

sheets_deauth()

url <- '14HmwN2cEVAJHupuehCuLdwG9BXtR3COrxDgaaylLhkA'

x <- read_sheet(ss = url) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(perc_red = red/(red+white)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(perc_red)) 
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
ggplot(x, aes(perc_red)) + 
  geom_histogram() 
```
